channel.title: Ninja Burger Allies
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Ninja Burger Allies" - is there any way to get the allies easily

item.title: Ninja Burger Allies
item.content:encoded:
ugg i hate ninja burger… i am still looking for su-chan and i already have 3 knightmare frame parts. is there any easy way to get the ninja allies

P.S. the recode makes it much easier to get the frame parts… i suggest saving Power of Greass to get wasteland runes.)
